direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the addition and removal of URL protocols for attributes, with similar control flows and parameter handling.
The removeProtocols method affects the protocols allowed for attributes, which is directly related to the validation performed by isSafeAttribute.
Both methods involve validating protocols for attributes, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve removing elements or attributes from the safelist, with similar control flows and parameter handling.
The removeProtocols method affects the protocols allowed for attributes, which can indirectly impact the enforcement of attributes handled by addEnforcedAttribute.
